name: Coriolis force in rotating space habitat
name_original: Coriolis force in rotating space habitat
description:
Update : looks like mouse issues are fixed! Now working on porting it to mobile and adding a tutorial :)    
A simple physical simulation. You are in a space habitat. Your habitat rotates to provide artificial gravity. But is it really the same gravity? Throw balls in different directions and different positions to find out.   

Created using Godot Engine. Something I came up with quickly to understand the coriolis force.
